jmf.module

Interface IFrameworkController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Core

    public interface IFrameworkController
    Interface to control a ZMF instance. Created on 7/25/15.
    Author:
    Tobias Korb, Jonas Grunert, Jan Strau√ü

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AbstractModule getModule()
      Returns the controlled module
      boolean isStarted()
      Returns if zmf instance is started and no shutdown in progress
      boolean isStopped()
      Returns if instance not started or shutdown finished and no starting in progress
      void joinExecution()
      Joins the execution of the ZMF instance and the module, will block until the instance is shut down.
      void requestDisableModule()
      Requests disabling the module controlled by this instance controller as soon as possible.
      boolean requestDisableRemoteInstance(ModuleUniqueId id, long timeout)
      Requests the remote instance to be disabled.
      void requestEnableModule()
      Requests trying to enable the module controlled by this instance controller as soon as possible.
      boolean requestEnableRemoteInstance(ModuleUniqueId id, long timeout)
      Requests the remote instance to be enabled.
      void requestStopInstance()
      Requests to stop the instance as soon as possible.
      boolean requestStopRemoteInstance(ModuleUniqueId id, long timeout)
      Requests the remote instance to stop.
      void stopInstance()
      Stopps the instance immediately Will not will block until the instance is shut down.

    • Method Detail

      • requestEnableModule

        void requestEnableModule()
        Requests trying to enable the module controlled by this instance controller as soon as possible. Module will be enabled if all preconditions are satisfied (dependencies satisfied, module id unique)

      • requestDisableModule

        void requestDisableModule()
        Requests disabling the module controlled by this instance controller as soon as possible.

      • requestStopInstance

        void requestStopInstance()
        Requests to stop the instance as soon as possible. Will not will block until the instance is shut down.

      • requestEnableRemoteInstance

        boolean requestEnableRemoteInstance(ModuleUniqueId id,
                                    long timeout)
        Requests the remote instance to be enabled. Will wait for the given timeout (ms) and return true only if a reply was received for the request and if the received reply was positive

      • requestDisableRemoteInstance

        boolean requestDisableRemoteInstance(ModuleUniqueId id,
                                     long timeout)
        Requests the remote instance to be disabled. Will wait for the given timeout (ms) and return true only if a reply was received for the request and if the received reply was positive

      • requestStopRemoteInstance

        boolean requestStopRemoteInstance(ModuleUniqueId id,
                                  long timeout)
        Requests the remote instance to stop. Will wait for the given timeout (ms) and return true only if a reply was received for the request and if the received reply was positive

      • stopInstance

        void stopInstance()
        Stopps the instance immediately Will not will block until the instance is shut down.

      • joinExecution

        void joinExecution()
        Joins the execution of the ZMF instance and the module, will block until the instance is shut down.

      • getModule

        AbstractModule getModule()
        Returns the controlled module

      • isStarted

        boolean isStarted()
        Returns if zmf instance is started and no shutdown in progress

      • isStopped

        boolean isStopped()
        Returns if instance not started or shutdown finished and no starting in progress
